portfolio.title: CRYPTOVERSE WEB APP
portfolio.description: Developed the web application where one can see crypto details, prices, crypto news and exchanges using reactjs, redux, redux-thunk middleware

portfolio.title: TASKIFY
portfolio.description: A simple to-do list app where one can drag and drop their completed and uncompleted tasks, build using typescript and react

portfolio.title: MOVIE RATING APP
portfolio.description: Developed the web application where one can go and check the details and reviews about any movies and shows details, using react js redux, redux-thunk middleware

portfolio.title: SOCIAL MEDIA APP
portfolio.description: Developed an social media web app where one can post anything,like and comment respectively using MongoDb,ReactJs,and Node Js with GraphQL
